headline: Is Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) Pricing Reflecting Recent Multi Year Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Skyworks Solutions is starting to look like value or just a stock under pressure, this article will walk you through what the current pricing really suggests. The shares last closed at US$60.66, and investors have seen a 4.3% decline over the past week, an 11.5% decline over the last month, a 5.8% decline year to date, a 31.8% decline over one year and 34.1% and 56.3% declines over three and five years respectively. Those moves have come as the chip sector...
